question: You are advised to write a minimum of 150 wordsYou are a teacher at a secondary school (high school). You have been asked to arrange a visit to a local museum or tourist attraction for some of your students. Write a letter to the manager of the museum or tourist attraction. In your letter you should:•  Say who you are and which school you teach at?•  Say why the school would like the students to visit the museum/attraction?•  Ask about educational facilities or information that the museum/attraction can provide?
text: I am writing to inform you that Ellie High is interested in using your museum as a tourist centre for students in grade eight.

My name is Simeon Agbanoma and I am the grade eight teacher for Ellie High in Texas, USA. We have a total number of two hundred and ten students and we  are looking at bringing them your way for tours.

Going forward, after  thorough research we shortlisted Arts Museum because of the information and real-time stories students get to learn from their visit. We would like to see more of the handcrafted objects and weapons from  world war III.

Finally, I would like to make inquiries about other related activities and attractions that your museum provides.Kindly state the prices of each other services so we can budget accordingly and also state the time span for each activity, would the space accommodate all students or we make plans for them to come in batches. Kindly revert as soon as possible.
